00045    void LammpsConfigIo::read(std::istream &in)
00046    {
00047       // Calculate atomCapacity for entire simulation
00048       int atomCapacity = 0;
00049       int bondCapacity = 0;
00050       int nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00051       int speciesCapacity = 0;
00052       int iSpec, i;
00053       Species* speciesPtr;
00054       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00055          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00056          speciesCapacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00057          atomCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nAtom();
00058          bondCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nBond();
00059       }
00060 
00061 
00062       // Read and discard title line
00063       std::string       line;
00064       std::getline(in, line);
00065 
00066       // Read numbers of atoms, bonds, etc.
00067       int nAtom;
00068       int nBond;
00069       int nAngle;
00070       int nDihedral;
00071       int nImproper;
00072       in >> nAtom >> Label("atoms");
00073       in >> nBond >> Label("bonds");
00074       in >> nAngle >> Label("angles");
00075       in >> nDihedral >> Label("dihedrals");
00076       in >> nImproper >> Label("impropers");
00077   
00078       /* 
00079       * Validate nAtom and nBond
00080       * Lammps files can be read only if the number of atoms and bonds
00081       * in the lammps file exactly matches the corresponding capacities.
00082       */
00083       if (nAtom != atomCapacity) {
00084          UTIL_THROW("nAtom != atomCapacity");
00085       } 
00086       if (nBond != bondCapacity) {
00087          UTIL_THROW("nAtom != atomCapacity");
00088       } 
00089 
00090       // Read numbers of atom types, bond types, etc.
00091       int nAtomType;
00092       int nBondType;
00093       int nAngleType;
00094       int nDihedralType;
00095       int nImproperType;
00096       in >> nAtomType >> Label("atom") >> Label("types");
00097       in >> nBondType >> Label("bond") >> Label("types");
00098       in >> nAngleType >> Label("angle") >> Label("types");
00099       in >> nDihedralType >> Label("dihedral") >> Label("types");
00100       in >> nImproperType >> Label("improper") >> Label("types");
00101 
00102       if (nAtomType > simulation().nAtomType()) {
00103          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > simulation().nAtomType()");
00104       } 
00105       // Read boundary dimensions
00106       Vector lengths;
00107       Vector min;
00108       Vector max;
00109       in >> min[0] >> max[0] >> Label("xlo") >> Label("xhi");
00110       in >> min[1] >> max[1] >> Label("ylo") >> Label("yhi");
00111       in >> min[2] >> max[2] >> Label("zlo") >> Label("zhi");
00112       lengths.subtract(max, min);
00113       boundary().setOrthorhombic(lengths);
00114 
00115       // Read particle masses (discard values)
00116       double mass;
00117       int    atomTypeId;
00118       in >> Label("Masses");
00119       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00120          in >> atomTypeId >> mass;
00121       }
00122 
00123       /*
00124       * Read atomic positions
00125       *
00126       * Atom tags must appear in order, numbered from 1
00127       */
00128       in >> Label("Atoms");
00129       Molecule*                molPtr;
00130       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00131       IntVector                shift;
00132       int atomId, molId, iMol, nMolecule;
00133       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00134          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00135          nMolecule  = speciesPtr->capacity();
00136          for (iMol = 0; iMol < nMolecule; ++iMol) {
00137             molPtr = &(speciesPtr->reservoir().pop());
00138             system().addMolecule(*molPtr);
00139    
00140             if (molPtr != &system().molecule(iSpec, iMol)) {
00141                UTIL_THROW("Molecule index error");
00142             }
00143    
00144             // Read positions, shift into primary cell
00145             for (molPtr->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00146 
00147                in >> atomId >> molId >> atomTypeId;
00148                if (atomId != atomIter->id() + 1) 
00149                   UTIL_THROW("Atom tags not ordered");
00150 
00151                in >> atomIter->position();
00152  
00153                // Shift coordinates to box (0, length(i));
00154                atomIter->position() += min;
00155 
00156                in >> shift;
00157 
00158             }
00159          }
00160       }
00161 
00162       #if 0
00163       #endif
00164 
00165    }
00166 
00167    void LammpsConfigIo::write(std::ostream &out)
00168    {
00169       using std::endl;
00170 
00171       // Write first line (skipped) and a blank line.
00172       out << "LAMMPS data file" << endl;
00173       out << endl;
00174 
00175       // Count total numbers of atoms and bonds in all species.
00176       Species  *speciesPtr;
00177       int       iSpec, nMolecule;
00178       int       nAtom = 0;
00179       int       nBond = 0;
00180       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00181          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00182          nMolecule  = system().nMolecule(iSpec);
00183          nAtom += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nAtom());
00184          nBond += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nBond());
00185       }
00186 
00187       // Write numbers of atoms, bonds, etc.
00188       Format::setDefaultWidth(8);
00189       out << Int(nAtom) << " atoms    " << endl;
00190       out << Int(nBond) << " bonds    " << endl;
00191       out << Int(0)     << " angles   " << endl;
00192       out << Int(0)     << " dihedrals" << endl;
00193       out << Int(0)     << " impropers" << endl;
00194       out << endl;
00195 
00196       // Write numbers of atom types, bond types, etc.
00197       Format::setDefaultWidth(5);
00198       out << Int(simulation().nAtomType()) << " atom types" << endl;
00199       out << Int(simulation().nBondType()) << " bond types" << endl;
00200       out << Int(0) << " angle types" << endl;
00201       out << Int(0) << " dihedral types" << endl;
00202       out << Int(0) << " improper types" << endl;
00203       out << endl;
00204 
00205       // Write Boundary dimensions
00206       Vector lengths = boundary().lengths();
00207       Format::setDefaultWidth(15);
00208       Format::setDefaultPrecision(7);
00209       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[0]) << "  xlo xhi" << endl;
00210       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[1]) << "  ylo yhi" << endl;
00211       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[2]) << "  zlo zhi" << endl;
00212       out << endl;
00213 
00214       // Write masses (all set to 1.0 for now)
00215       // lammps atom type = Simpatico atom type + 1
00216       out << "Masses" << endl;
00217       out << endl;
00218       for (int iType = 0; iType < simulation().nAtomType(); ++iType) {
00219           out << Int(iType+1, 5) << Dbl(1.0) << endl;
00220       }
00221       out << endl;
00222 
00223       // Write atomic positions
00224       // lammps atom     tag = Simpatico atom id + 1
00225       // lammps molecule id  = Simpatico molecule id + 1
00226       out << "Atoms" << endl;
00227       out << endl;
00228       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00229       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00230       int i;
00231       int shift = 0;
00232       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00233          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00234             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00235                out << Int( atomIter->id() + 1, 8 ) << Int( molIter->id() + 1, 8 );
00236                out << Int( atomIter->typeId() + 1, 5 );
00237                out << atomIter->position();
00238                for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00239                   out << Int(shift, 4);
00240                }
00241                out << endl;
00242             }
00243          }
00244       }
00245       out << endl;
00246 
00247       // Write bond topology
00248       out << "Bonds" << endl;
00249       out << endl;
00250       Molecule::BondIterator bondIter;
00251       int                    iBond = 1;
00252       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00253          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00254             for (molIter->begin(bondIter); bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00255                out << Int(iBond, 8 ) << Int(bondIter->typeId() + 1, 5);
00256                out << Int(bondIter->atom(0).id() + 1, 8);
00257                out << Int(bondIter->atom(1).id() + 1, 8);
00258                out << endl;
00259                ++iBond;
00260             }
00261          }
00262       }
00263       out << endl;
00264 
00265       // Reset Format defaults to initialization values
00266       Format::initStatic();
00267    }
00268 
00269 } 
00270 #endif
